about_the_game:
The artificial satellite with interrupted power supply needs repair. Let's navigate the space platform and collect the parts. If possible, challenge the mission with minimal movement to conserve energy.

There are 49 stages prepared, and clearing the game shouldn't be difficult, but breaking the high score could be challenging.
detailed_description:
The artificial satellite with interrupted power supply needs repair. Let's navigate the space platform and collect the parts. If possible, challenge the mission with minimal movement to conserve energy.

There are 49 stages prepared, and clearing the game shouldn't be difficult, but breaking the high score could be challenging.
name: Satellite engineer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
